channel.title: [pi] a couple of questions [I STILL NEED HELP WITH THIS!]
channel.description:
I am just going to post all the problems i want to fix so help if you can:) Also i have tried to fix/edit these problems but i can't so that is why i am posting.
1. when you make a fire it is invisible, and i think it has to do with these to lines of code in the firemaking class [code]Objects fire = new Objects(2732,c.getX(),c.getY(), 0, -1, 10, 3); Objects fire2 = new Objects(2732,c.getX(),c.getY(), 0, -1, 10, 60);[/code] i have tried editing the numbers, commenting out lines and i cant fix it :/
2.How would i add vengeance gfx? I think this could be client sided but I am not sure, or what is the pi vengeance gfx id? if soul split came with it.
3.How can i make the prayer drain slower?
That is all for now, pleas help i will rep+ for the help and it will be greatly appreciated.
